item.title: GameZone
item.description: Used Commands Task 1 Google: Who’s the guy? This guy is known from a videogame called Hitman. I’m pretty sure you can find his name on your own. Task 2 Obtain access via SQL Injection The task description gives you a good idea about SQL injection and how it can be used or better abused to query some data (sensitive data exposure). The target is to rewrite a prepared statement, that is intended to validate i.

item.title: HackPark
